Impossible to comment without good pictures of what you refer to. If 
you s=
ee no grain in the hada it is certainly an indication it is 
machine made, =
if the polish is good enough to tell. The hamon of a 
machine made blade wh=
en oil quenched shows lack of activity, a clue. 
Focus your pics on the nak=
ago and mei for appraisal. Fred knows his 
stuff so he is probably right. J=
ohn
